metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16744 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in mgetty before 1.2.1. In fax_notify_mail() in faxrec.c, the mail_to parameter is not sanitized. It could allow for command injection if untrusted input can reach it, because popen is used.

criterions.comment: mgetty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
